website_summaries.verdict: An ideal liquid eyeliner for detail. Felt tip can produce thick or thin lines.
pros: An all-day liquid eyeliner that can be used to create a variety of detailed effects
The felt-tip applicator can easily be used to produce heavy or subtle looks
cons: Creates a somewhat shiny finish, unlike the comparable Koala
Prone to drying up quickly, even with the cap in place

customer_reviews.title: Great liner for a winged cat eye look
customer_reviews.text: Great but Carpates is a bit shiny. Will try Koala next. I didn't care for the Atlantic blue. Not dark or bright, more navy. A good liner though. Comes off with remover easier than Stila but won't smudge all day with a shadow base applied. If you need waterproof liner Stila is your brand.
customer_reviews.author: Bette D. Young

customer_reviews.title: It dried up in a couple of days
customer_reviews.text: I am sure the cap was on it. But, it was completely dried up a couple days after I opened it. So, it ended up being a waste of money. I wanted to like it. But, it just wasn't in the cards.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No smear, no smudge, easy to apply
customer_reviews.text: My new favorite find. I love this eyeliner. You can make thin or thick lines easily and the colors are very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Paige

customer_reviews.title: Not easy to put on
customer_reviews.text: It was really a hard tip and not easy to put on very shifty. Did not like this product at all and contacted NARS about it.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Heather

customer_reviews.title: Nice straight line
customer_reviews.text: I like it but wish the tip was firmer so I could be pinpoint precise. Smudges as the day wears on
customer_reviews.author: Edward

customer_reviews.title: Great eyeliners
customer_reviews.text: It stays all day, doesn't run. Great eyeliner, easy to apply, most use eye make up remover to remove it.
customer_reviews.author: JLS

customer_reviews.title: Best liner I've even tried!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this liner - don't think I'll ever use anything else. Doesn't smudge, fade, and is super easy to apply. Thanks!!
customer_reviews.author: MrsGTaylor

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: This eyeliner is on your eyes for the night! A little hard to get off:)
customer_reviews.author: Susan Grogan

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Eyeliner
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite eyeliner. It goes on smoothly and stays put for the day, yet washes off easily with soap and water. I use it daily and a tube will last about 3 months, sometimes more. The only slight complaint I have is that a new tube flows too easily and it's hard to control the line. After a couple of weeks of use, it's fine.
customer_reviews.author: Ella Marks

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Eyeliner Ever
customer_reviews.text: I first received this eyeliner in the Edie Sedgwick gift box I got last Christmas. I used it every day for months until it ran out. Highly recommend. Doesn't flake or smudge. It applies smoothly and easily. I had a consistent look every day. A+ favorite makeup tool to date.
customer_reviews.author: sarah hinton

product_meta.title: Nars Carpates Eyeliner, 0.7 Fluid Ounce
product_meta.description: A modern liquid liner that ensures a flawless even line with just one stroke. Features a super-fine tip for precise definition and versatile application options.
feature_bullets: A modern liquid liner that ensures a flawless even line with just one stroke
Features a super-fine tip for precise definition and versatile application options
